definitions.body: stream, flow abundantly (of milk, tears, rain, etc.), cf. I. [[דְּרוֹר]].
be abundant, luxuriant (of her-bage), cf. darda0run a kind of tree, now elm (Lane), & [[דַּרְדַּר]].
run vehemently, easily (of horse), cf. dariyrun swift horse, or other beast, & II. [[דְּרוֹר]].
give light, shine (of lamp), cf. kawkabun dur=iy=un shining star, dur=iy=un glistening or shining of sword, dur=un pearls (coll.) & [[דַּר]]; hence prob. [[דָּרוֹם]]).
